personal.name: Alex Cyber
personal.title: Full-Stack Developer
personal.bio: A passionate developer who lives at the intersection of creativity and code. I specialize in building immersive web experiences with cutting-edge technologies, bringing futuristic visions to life through elegant code and innovative design.

projects.title: CyberDash Analytics
projects.description: Real-time data visualization platform with 3D graphs and neon UI elements. Built with React, Three.js, and WebGL shaders.

projects.title: Neon Portfolio
projects.description: Futuristic portfolio website with particle animations, glowing effects, and smooth transitions.

projects.title: Quantum Calculator
projects.description: Advanced calculator with quantum computing simulations and holographic display effects.

achievements.title: Google Developer Challenge
achievements.description: Successfully completed advanced web development challenges focusing on performance optimization and modern JavaScript frameworks.

achievements.title: Cybersecurity Certification
achievements.description: Earned advanced certification in cybersecurity principles, ethical hacking, and network security protocols.

achievements.title: AI/ML Bootcamp Winner
achievements.description: First place in intensive machine learning bootcamp, developing innovative AI solutions for real-world problems.

achievements.title: Open Source Contributor
achievements.description: Active contributor to major open source projects with over 500 commits and multiple merged pull requests.

achievements.title: Hackathon Champion
achievements.description: Won first place in 48-hour hackathon by creating innovative fintech solution with blockchain integration.
